stanza.line: Nature's bequest gives nothing but doth (a)lend(/a)
And being frank she lends to those are (b)free(/b)
Then beauteous niggard why dost thou (c)abuse(/c)
The bounteous largess given thee to (d)give(/d)
So great a sum of sums yet canst not (d)live(/d)
For having traffic with thy self (e)alone(/e)
Thou of thy self thy sweet self dost (f)deceive(/f)
Then how when nature calls thee to be (e)gone(/e)
Thy unused beauty must be tombed with (g)thee(/g)
Which used lives th' executor to (g)be(/g)
